product.longDescription: Capture is a vigorous grower that produces 3-6 lb. heads depending on planting density. Heads are round when grown in the South but will be flat-round when grown in the North. Good flavor makes it suitable for fresh use and cole slaw. High resistance to Fusarium yellows; and intermediate resistance to black rot. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 128,400 seeds/lb. Packet: 50 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Excellent for Southern areas with black rot pressure.
